      • setSelection

        public void setSelection​(java.lang.String type)
        Description copied from interface: RasterLayer2
        Specifies the selection to be displayed. If null, the layer will automatically select the imagery based on the current resolution.
        Specified by:
        setSelection in interface RasterLayer2
        Parameters:
        type - The selection. Should be one of the values returned by RasterLayer2.getSelectionOptions().
        See Also:
        RasterLayer2.getSelectionOptions()

      • setSelectionImpl

      • setAutoSelectValueNoSync

        protected void setAutoSelectValueNoSync​(java.lang.String autoselect)
        Sets the auto-select value. This method must be externally synchronized while holding the lock on this.
        Parameters:
        autoselect - The new auto-select value

      • getSelection

        public java.lang.String getSelection()
        Description copied from interface: RasterLayer2
        Returns the current selection. If the layer is currently in auto-select mode, the value returned should be the content currently displayed. In the case where multiple content is displayed, the recommendation is to return the value for the top-most content.
        Specified by:
        getSelection in interface RasterLayer2
        Returns:
        The current selection

        Description copied from interface: RasterLayer2

        Specified by:

        Returns:
